document.full_text: at the end of cameron crowe's moving and eloquently simple documentary, "the union," elton john sings "you're never too old to hold somebody."
document.title: crowe pays homage to elton john, leon russell
lines_and_colors: at the end of cameron crowe's moving and eloquently simple documentary, "the union," elton john sings "you're never too old to hold somebody."
